instructions.desktop: Use arrow keys to move tiles. Combine matching numbers to reach 2048!
instructions.mobile: Swipe in any direction to move tiles. Combine matching numbers to reach 2048!

how_to_play.title: How to Play
items: Swipe or use arrow keys to move all tiles
When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!
Every move adds a new tile (2 or 4) to the board
Goal: Create a tile with the number 2048

tips.title: Pro Tips
items: Keep your highest value tile in a corner
Build chains of decreasing values around it
Plan several moves ahead - don't rush!
Keep the board as clean as possible
